action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: This is a still image from a puzzle video game that appears to be a game similar to Tetris. There are three Tetris blocks in play; one purple 'T' block in the center, one green 'J' block below it, and one yellow 'L' block to the right. The background is plain white, and the game has a minimalist graphic style with simple, bold block shapes and colors against the stark white backdrop. No other elements or texts are visible in the image.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixelated assortment of Tetris-like game pieces colored in red, orange, yellow, and purple. There are a variety of pieces, including straight bars, 'L' shapes, 'T' shapes, and 'Z' shapes, each represented in different colors. The pattern suggests a static board of the block puzzle game with pieces scattered around, none of which are aligned to form solid horizontal lines as would be the objective in Tetris.

This is my DESCRIPTION: This is a still image from a puzzle video game that appears to be a game similar to Tetris. There are three Tetris blocks in play; one purple 'T' block in the center, one green 'J' block below it, and one yellow 'L' block to the right. The background is plain white, and the game has a minimalist graphic style with simple, bold block shapes and colors against the stark white backdrop. No other elements or texts are visible in the image.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
Question: Do you see any orange blocks in your image?
